author: protolambda
content:
https://github.com/protolambda/go-kate
Part of the work on DAS, *experimental*. Full Go version based on the research python code, and with pre-computation + other optimizations + more utils.
Includes an integration test that does the A-Z, a long list of features: create data, convert to polynomial, bit-reverse ordering, data-extension, proof multi-generation with FK20 method (thanks to Dankrad and others for research/python work), building samples, verifying their proofs, losing 1/2 of the samples, data-recovery, reconstruction of original data.
